sentences.en: But Wal - Mart rejected the report as untrue and unsubstantiated.
sentences.cn: 但是, 沃尔玛 驳斥这项报告是不真实,缺乏事实依据.

sentences.en: I do object to their claim, which I find totally unsubstantiated.
sentences.cn: 我强烈反对他们的说法，那是毫无根据的。

sentences.en: Many contemporary publications quote figures that are unsubstantiated.
sentences.cn: 许多现行刊物所采用的数字是不确切的.

sentences.en: Many newspapers quoted figures that are unsubstantiated.
sentences.cn: 许多报纸采用了不确切的数字.
未经证实的虐待儿童的指控

words.tran_cn: 未经证实的，无事实根据的

trans.tran_cn: 未经证实的，没有事实根据的
